messages.content: ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes is an extension for ComfyUI that adds support for wildcards, allowing users to use __name__ syntax in prompts to get a random line from a file named name.txt in a wildcards directory.

To install ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes, navigate to the custom_nodes directory in your ComfyUI installation, clone the repository using 'git clone https://github.com/GTSuya-Studio/ComfyUI-Gtsuya-Nodes.git', and then restart ComfyUI.
What is the purpose of the 'Simple wildcards' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes?

The 'Simple wildcards' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes allows users to create a directory named 'wildcards' in the ComfyUI root folder and use wildcard words in prompts to get random lines from corresponding text files.
How does the 'Simple wildcards (Dir.)' node differ from the 'Simple wildcards' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes?

The 'Simple wildcards (Dir.)' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes is similar to 'Simple wildcards' but allows users to choose any directory on their hard drive containing wildcards files, not just the ComfyUI root directory.
What is the purpose of the 'Wildcards Nodes' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes?

The 'Wildcards Nodes' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes allows users to manage wildcards lists and values directly from ComfyUI workflows, without relying on external text files, by working in conjunction with 'Random Line' nodes from Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes.
What is the 'Danbooru (ID)' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes used for?
The 'Danbooru (ID)' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes allows users to automatically get image URLs and tags lists from a post hosted on the Danbooru website by providing the post ID number.
How does the 'Danbooru (Random)' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes work?

The 'Danbooru (Random)' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes allows users to automatically get image URLs and tags lists from a random post hosted on the Danbooru website, with the option to restrict results to a specific tag query, by providing a valid API key and login from the Danbooru website.
What is the purpose of the 'Replace Strings' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes?

The 'Replace Strings' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes allows users to automatically delete or replace specific strings in a text or prompt by linking inputs to two text nodes and specifying the strings to be replaced or deleted.
How does the 'Random File From Path' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes work?

The 'Random File From Path' node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes returns a random file path from a specified directory, which can be used in conjunction with the 'Load Image From URL' node from comfyui-art-venture to import the corresponding image directly into ComfyUI.
